LanguageData.WNA_AbilityInvisibility.label: 隐身
LanguageData.WNA_AbilityWisdom.label: 获赐智慧
LanguageData.WNA_AbilityWisdom.description: 此人从威灵会的一位圣徒处获得了额外的智慧.
LanguageData.WNA_Disabled.label: 失能
LanguageData.WNA_Disabled.description: 没有启灵神经的人遭遇灵能剥夺的后遗症. 一般来说这种情况在大概三天后就会消失.
LanguageData.WNA_PsychicTrauma.label: 灵能创伤
LanguageData.WNA_PsychicTrauma.description: 启灵神经被强行剥夺导致的创伤.
LanguageData.WNA_PsychicTrauma.comps.HediffComp_Surge: 由于{PAWN_nameDef}经历的粗暴的灵能剥夺, {PAWN_nameDef}因严重的灵能创伤陷入瘫痪. {PAWN_nameDef}是否能从当前状态中康复尚未可知.
